text: Kiss of Death is a 1995 thriller movie. A former convict living in New York City tries to go straight. He is derailed when he gets into transportation of stolen cars. Samuel L. Jackson plays Detective Calvin, Helen Hunt plays Bev Kilmartin, David Caruso plays ex-con Jimmy Kilmartin and Nicolas Cage plays Little Junior Brown. This movie was released in April 1995 and received mixed reviews from the movie critics. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1995 thriller movies Category:1995 drama movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies directed by Barbet Schroeder
title: Kiss of Death (1995 movie)
